content: Enable this option if you want to add users from LDAP server to {{productName}} automatically. The added users will be able to authorize using their LDAP server credentials. {{productName}} does not save the user passwords locally and will authenticate users sending their login and password to LDAP server.

comment.text: Enable this option to automatically add users from an LDAP server to {{productName}}, allowing them to authenticate using their LDAP credentials. This setting is part of PortalSettings and appears in toggle options within the integration settings section.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "دليل بيانات اعتماد LDAP الخاص بهم" (credentials of their LDAP directory) is not the most accurate translation of "their LDAP server credentials". It implies a directory rather than a server.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتمكين هذا الخيار إذا كنت تريد إضافة مستخدمين تلقائيًا من LDAP إلى {{productName}}. سيتمكن المستخدمون المضافون من التفويض باستخدام بيانات اعتماد خادم LDAP الخاص بهم.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "إلى دليل LDAP" (to LDAP directory) is incorrect.  It should be "إلى خادم LDAP" (to LDAP server).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتمكين هذا الخيار إذا كنت تريد إضافة مستخدمين تلقائيًا من LDAP إلى {{productName}}. سيتمكن المستخدمون المضافون من التفويض باستخدام بيانات اعتماد خادم LDAP الخاص بهم. لا يحفظ {{productName}} كلمات مرور المستخدم محليًا وسيقوم بمصادقة المستخدمين الذين يرسلون معلومات تسجيل الدخول وكلمة المرور الخاصة بهم إلى خادم LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "LDAP server məlumatlarından istifadə edərək avtorizasiya edə biləcəklər" is a slightly awkward translation of 'authorize using their LDAP server credentials'. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'LDAP server vasitəsilə təsdiq edə biləcəklər' or 'LDAP server hesabları ilə daxil ola biləcəklər'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP server vasitəsilə təsdiq edə biləcəklər

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '{{productName}}' in the translated text may need to be consistent with the product's naming conventions in Azerbaijani. Ensure the surrounding text is adapted appropriately.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify if '{{productName}}' is the correct placeholder or if a localized product name should be used.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "идентификационни данни" is a bit formal and less common in this context. A more natural translation for "credentials" would be something like "удостоверяващи данни" or simply "данни за вход".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Активирайте тази опция, ако искате автоматично да добавяте потребители от LDAP сървър към {{productName}}. Добавените потребители ще могат да се оторизират с помощта на техните данни за вход за LDAP сървър.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Přidaní uživatelé" is grammatically incorrect. It should be "Přidaní uživatelé" or "Přidaní uživatelé".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Přidaní uživatelé or Přidaní uživatelé

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "autorizovat" might not be the most natural translation for "authorize" in this context. A more common term would be "přihlašovat se" or "ověřovat".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: přihlašovat se or ověřovat

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'autorisieren' (authorize) doesn't quite fit the context of 'log in'. A better translation would be 'anmelden' or 'einloggen'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aktivieren Sie diese Option, wenn Sie Benutzer vom LDAP-Server automatisch zu {{productName}} hinzufügen möchten. Die hinzugefügten Benutzer können sich mit ihren LDAP-Server-Anmeldedaten anmelden/einloggen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Login' should be translated into German.  It should be 'Anmeldename' or 'Benutzername'. While 'Login' is sometimes used in German, it is not ideal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aktivieren Sie diese Option, wenn Sie Benutzer vom LDAP-Server automatisch zu {{productName}} hinzufügen möchten. Die hinzugefügten Benutzer können sich mit ihren LDAP-Server-Anmeldedaten anmelden/einloggen. {{productName}} speichert die Benutzerkennwörter nicht lokal und authentifiziert die Benutzer, indem es deren Benutzername und Kennwort an den LDAP-Server sendet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The double curly braces `{{productName}}` are present in the Greek translation, which is correct but should be consistent with the English source. Ensure this placeholder is handled correctly in the final implementation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify the placeholder `{{productName}}` is properly replaced with the product name during rendering.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "antaa valtuutuksen" is not the most natural way to express "authorize" in this context. A more common translation would be "kirjautua" or "todentaa".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota tämä vaihtoehto käyttöön, jos haluat lisätä käyttäjiä LDAP-palvelimelta {{productName}}:een automaattisesti. Lisätyt käyttäjät voivat kirjautua käyttäen LDAP-palvelimen kirjautumistietoja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kirjautumistietoja' is a general term for credentials, but in this context it's referring to login details. While not incorrect, 'sisäänkirjautumistiedot' would be a more precise translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota tämä vaihtoehto käyttöön, jos haluat lisätä käyttäjiä LDAP-palvelimelta {{productName}}:een automaattisesti. Lisätyt käyttäjät voivat kirjautua käyttäen LDAP-palvelimen sisäänkirjautumistiedot.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'données d'identification' is a more formal translation of 'credentials.' While technically correct, 'identifiants' would be more natural and commonly used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Activez cette option si vous souhaitez ajouter automatiquement à {{productName}} des utilisateurs provenant du serveur LDAP. Les utilisateurs ajoutés pourront s'authentifier à l'aide de leurs identifiants du serveur LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Inconsistency in variable usage: The English content uses '{{productName}}', while the Armenian translation uses the same notation, which is acceptable. However, ensure consistency across all translations for this variable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure all instances of the variable are consistently formatted (e.g., always use '{{productName}}' or a different style if a project standard exists).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'իրենց LDAP սերվեր-ի հավատարմագրերը' could be improved. The hyphen is unnecessary and slightly awkward. It would be more natural to write 'իրենց LDAP սերվերի հավատարմագրերը'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'իրենց LDAP սերվեր-ի հավատարմագրերը' to 'իրենց LDAP սերվերի հավատարմագրերը'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'կնույնականացնի այն օգտվողներին, ովքեր իրենց մուտքն ու գաղտնաբառը ուղարկում են LDAP սերվեր' is a bit verbose and could be more concise. It implies an action on behalf of the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: 'կնույնականացնի օգտվողներին, ովքեր իրենց մուտքն ու գաղտնաբառը ուղարկում են LDAP սերվերին' (Adding the dative case ending 'ին' makes it flow better and clarifies the direction of the sending).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated use of "LDAP 서버" can be slightly repetitive. Consider rephrasing for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace some instances of "LDAP 서버" with simply "LDAP" or restructure the sentences to avoid repetition.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is understandable, the phrasing 'LDAP 서버 자격 증명을 사용하여 인증할 수 있습니다' is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow. The English says 'authorize using their LDAP server credentials'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'LDAP 서버에 저장된 인증 정보를 사용하여 로그인할 수 있습니다' or 'LDAP 서버의 로그인 정보를 사용하여 인증할 수 있습니다'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'authenticate users sending their login and password to LDAP server' is slightly awkward. The intent is that the application sends the credentials, not the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase to something like '{{productName}}은 사용자의 로그인 정보와 비밀번호를 LDAP 서버로 전송하여 사용자를 인증합니다.' or '{{productName}}은 사용자의 로그인 정보와 비밀번호를 LDAP 서버로 전송하여 인증을 처리합니다.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຮັບສິດໃຊ້ງານໄດ້" (rab sit chai ngan dai) is a bit awkward. It translates to "able to use privileges" but doesn't quite convey the meaning of "authorize." A better translation would focus on authentication or access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຮັບສິດເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຂໍ້ມູນຮັບສິດເຂົ້າໃຊ້ງານ" (khomun rab sit khao chai ngan) is too literal. It means 'access information' but it's better to be more concise and clear. It’s referring to login credentials.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຂໍ້ມູນເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ບ່ອນແຫ່ງນີ້" (bon haeng ni) is unnecessary and doesn't add clarity. It refers to the local system, but it's implied.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແກ້ໄຂນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and complex. It should be split into smaller sentences for better readability in Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອະນຸຍາກາດຕົວເລືອກນີ້ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການເພີ່ມຜູ້ໃຊ້ຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP ໄປສູ່ {{productName}} ໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ. ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ເພີ່ມເຂົ້າມານີ້ຈະສາມາດຮັບສິດເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບໄດ້ໂດຍໃຊ້ຂໍ້ມູນເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າຈາກເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP. ຜະລິດຕະພັນ {{productName}} ບໍ່ໄດ້ບັນທຶກລະບົບເອກະສານານຸສັນຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ໄວ້ ແລະຈະຮັບການຢັ້ງຢືນຜູ້ໃຊ້ໂດຍສົ່ງຂໍ້ມູນເຂົ້າໃຊ້ງານ ແລະລະບົບເອກະສານານຸສັນຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າໄປສູ່ເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "inloggegevens" is a generic term for login details. While understandable, a more precise translation for "credentials" would be something like "verificatiemiddelen" or "authenticatiemiddelen".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Schakel deze optie in als u gebruikers van de LDAP server automatisch wilt toevoegen aan {{productName}}. De toegevoegde gebruikers kunnen autoriseren met hun verificatiemiddelen/authenticatiemiddelen van de LDAP server.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "autorizar usando suas credenciais" is not the most natural way to express "authorize using their credentials." A more common phrasing would be "acessar usando suas credenciais" or "fazer login usando suas credenciais".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ative esta opção se desejar adicionar usuários do servidor LDAP ao {{productName}} automaticamente. Os usuários adicionados poderão acessar usando suas credenciais de servidor LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "O {{productName}} não salva as senhas dos usuários localmente e autenticará os usuários enviando seu login e senha para o servidor LDAP." is a bit clunky. A smoother translation would emphasize the verification process and avoid passive voice where possible.  Also, 'seu login e senha' is a bit verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O {{productName}} não armazena as senhas dos usuários localmente e verificará a autenticação enviando o login para o servidor LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Parolele utilizatorilor nu sunt salvate și stocate de {{productName}}" is slightly awkward and not the best way to convey the meaning. The original English mentions that passwords are not saved locally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Parolele utilizatorilor nu sunt salvate local de {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of "LDAP server" is redundant. The original English only uses 'LDAP server' once.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Parolele utilizatorilor nu sunt salvate local de {{productName}}, dar nume de utilizator și parolă sunt trimise pentru autentificare către serverul LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "server" appears twice in the last sentence. While technically correct, it sounds repetitive. It might be clearer to remove one instance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Parolele utilizatorilor nu sunt salvate local de {{productName}}, dar nume de utilizator și parolă sunt trimise pentru autentificare către LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඔවුන්ගේ LDAP සේවක මුරපදය භාවිතයෙන් බලය ලබා ගැනීමට හැකි වනු ඇත" is not the best translation for "The added users will be able to authorize using their LDAP server credentials.". It literally translates to 'they will be able to get power using their LDAP server password'. A better phrasing would be something like "ඔවුන්ගේ LDAP සේවක පරිශීලකcredentials භාවිතයෙන් අවසර ලබා ගැනීමට හැකි වනු ඇත" or "ඔවුන්ගේ LDAP පරිශීලකcredentials භාවිතයෙන් ලෝගින් කිරීමට හැකි වනු ඇත".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔවුන්ගේ LDAP පරිශීලකcredentials භාවිතයෙන් ලෝගින් කිරීමට හැකි වනු ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "{{productName}} පරිශීලක මුරපදයන් දේශීයව සුරක්ෂිත නොකරනු අතර, ඔවුන්ගේ ලොග්ඉන් සහ මුරපදය LDAP සේවකයට යවා පරිශීලකයින්ගේ වලංගතාවය පරීක්ෂා කරනු ඇත" is a bit convoluted.  '{{productName}} does not save the user passwords locally and will authenticate users sending their login and password to LDAP server' can be translated more simply. The word වලංගතාවය (valangathavaya) – validity – is overly formal and doesn't quite fit the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}} පරිශීලක මුරපදයන් දේශීයව සුරක්ෂිත නොකරනු අතර, ඔවුන්ගේ ලොග්ඉන් සහ මුරපදය LDAP සේවකයට යවා පරිශීලකයින්ගේ අනන්‍යතාවය පරීක්ෂා කරනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'credentials' should be reflected in the Sinhala translation to maintain consistency, but the current translation doesn't use an equivalent term. This is particularly relevant since the English text explicitly mentions credentials.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding a Sinhala equivalent for 'credentials' (e.g., 'credentials' or a description of user login information) in the revised translation, ideally alongside 'LDAP පරිශීලකcredentials' to ensure clarity for Sinhala readers.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "authorize" is translated as "autorizovať". While technically correct, "autorizovať" is less common and sounds less natural in Slovak. A better translation would be "prihlásiť sa" or "overiť".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pridaní používatelia sa budú môcť prihlásiť/overiť pomocou svojich prihlasovacích údajov zo servera LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "login and password" is translated as "prihlasovacie meno a heslo". While technically correct, a more common and natural translation would be "užívateľské meno a heslo".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: …tak, že pošle ich užívateľské meno a heslo na server LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pošljejo svojo prijavo in geslo" is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it could be more elegantly phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: pošljejo svoje uporabniško ime in geslo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ауторизују' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'аутентификују'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: аутентификују

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'кориснике са LDAP сервера у {{productName}}' is slightly awkward. It could be more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: кориснике на {{productName}} са LDAP сервера

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'authenticate users sending their login and password' is translated as 'проверавац́е аутентичност корисника слањем њихове пријаве и лозинке'.  'проверавац́е аутентичност' is overly verbose. A more direct translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће аутентификовати кориснике слањем њихове пријаве и лозинке

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "yetkilendirme yapabilecektir" (will be able to authorize) is a bit awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'giriş yapabilecektir' (will be able to log in) or 'oturum açabilecektir' (will be able to access).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eklenen kullanıcılar LDAP sunucusu kimlik bilgilerini kullanarak giriş yapabilecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'kullanıcı adı ve parolalarını LDAP sunucusu göndererek yapar' is grammatically awkward and the wording is unclear. A better phrasing would clarify that the product sends the credentials.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}, kullanıcı adını ve parolasını LDAP sunucusuna göndererek kimlik doğrulaması yapar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The punctuation should be consistent. There's a period after "kimlik bilgilerini kullanarak yetkilendirme yapabilecektir" but not after the suggestion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eklenen kullanıcılar LDAP sunucusu kimlik bilgilerini kullanarak giriş yapabilecektir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'облікових даних' is a bit formal and could be improved for clarity and readability in this context. It translates to 'credentials' but a simpler term might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Увімкніть цей параметр, якщо ви хочете автоматично додавати користувачів із сервера LDAP до {{productName}}. Додані користувачі зможуть авторизуватися, використовуючи свої дані для сервера LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'authorize' is best translated as 'авторизуватися'.  While 'авторизуватися' is used, the phrase 'використовуючи свої дані' instead of 'за допомогою своїх облікових даних' is preferable for better flow and readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Увімкніть цей параметр, якщо ви хочете автоматично додавати користувачів із сервера LDAP до {{productName}}. Додані користувачі зможуть авторизуватися, використовуючи свої дані для сервера LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "ủy quyền" (authorization) is not the best translation for "authorize" in this context. "Xác thực" (authentication) would be more accurate and align with the subsequent explanation of how the users are validated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thay "ủy quyền" bằng "xác thực".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Các người dùng được thêm vào sẽ có thể ủy quyền sử dụng thông tin đăng nhập máy chủ LDAP của họ." is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "Người dùng đã thêm sẽ có thể xác thực sử dụng thông tin đăng nhập của họ trên máy chủ LDAP."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thay đổi thành: "Người dùng đã thêm sẽ có thể xác thực sử dụng thông tin đăng nhập của họ trên máy chủ LDAP."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a passive voice ('将通过向 LDAP 服务器 发送...') which feels less natural in Chinese.  A more active voice would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 将使用登录名和密码验证用户，并将信息发送至 LDAP 服务器。
